result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joel Martin Bruflodt

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: dated 8-30-16 from State PD requesting copy of case

records.descr: Notice of intent to pursue post-conviction relief

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 14CF302, 15CF398 & 15CF343. Defendant Joel Martin Bruflodt in court with attorney Nicholas Von Davis.  Defendant Joel Martin Bruflodt in custody.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:15 am.  2nd Amended Information filed as to 14CF302.  
No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.
14CF302-Count 1-NC plea.  Count 2-NC plea.  Count 3-NC plea.  CT accepts all pleas, adj guilty & judgment entered.
15CF398-DRI, 15CF343-DRI & Count 4 of 14CF302-DRI.
Order PSI, long form.  Agent not be present.  PSI due 4/22.  Davis-request modif of NC condition of bond.  CT amends Bond, striking NO CONTACT provision with Heather Muran. Bond cont as amended on its face.  9:47 am adj.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for May 5, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Information filed.  Davis-NG plea, WST.  Bonds cont.  15CF343 to be set for 2 day speedy trial, other files to track.  11:34 am adj.

CASES: 15CF398, 15CF343 & 14CF302. Defendant Joel Martin Bruflodt in court with attorney Nicholas Von Davis.  Defendant Joel Martin Bruflodt in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 11:20 am.  
15CF398-Exh 1-O&R.  ADA-motion for bind over.  CT finds PC, def bound over.

CASES: 15CF398, 14CF302 & 15CF343. Defendant Joel Martin Bruflodt in court with attorney Nicholas Von Davis.  Defendant Joel Martin Bruflodt in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 12:24 pm.
15CF398-CT sets bond.  WSPH.  JA to set for next hearing on all files w/ counsel.  Bonds cont. 12:30 pm adj.
